Author: Trivver Team
Title: [ANN][TOKEN][AR/VR] Trivver - Premier XR Advertising Network - Token Sale
Body: Final Update on TRVR Token Sale: Trivver's Token Sale did not reach the Softcap. We will be returning Ethers to all contributors. Dear Community,  We want to share with you that we did not reach the soft cap for the TRVR token sale, and will be returning pledged Ethers to all contributors. Expect to be refunded in your MyEtherWallet by October 15.  No bounty tokens will be distributed because the TRVR token project will not be launched.  While the TRVR token sale project will not continue, Trivver.com and the Trivver XR advertising network will continue. We feel very unfortunate with the timing of our token sale start. But we will continue to improve and expand the XR advertising space.  We continue to believe in the power of XR advertising to make the world a better place.  Thanks to everyone who supported us in our vision, whether via purchases or by sharing the Trivver vision with your friends. We appreciate you for believing in us and our dream.  Best, Joel LaMontagne CEO, Trivver

Author: SignorKiasu
Title: [ANN][TOKEN][AR/VR] Trivver - Premier XR Advertising Network - Token Sale
Body: MetaMask is a free browser extension wallet which provides an additional layer of security and is user-friendly for "newbies" who wish to invest.  I can understand that with your experience in crypto and having the hardware wallet Ledger, it might seem like a no brainer to just allow usage of them to buy into the TGE. However, to protect the newer entrants without the right tools, Metamask does give an added advantage over simply creating a MEW wallet.  Hope this clarifies that the team is not making investors jump through hoops, but wish to simplify the process to just a single type of wallet to prevent confusion.

Author: kvanier
Title: [ANN][TOKEN][AR/VR] Trivver - Premier XR Advertising Network - Token Sale
Body: Good morning!  TRVR is originated by the Company as a smart contract for commercial users of the Trivver platform to interact with all of the platform‚Äôs key components and act as settlement between Trivver and users of Trivver‚Äôs platform. For transparency, transacations are logged and viewable by everyone on the chain. Blockchain will be used to provide dependable auditability for ad views, so that advertisers can rest assured they're getting the views they pay for. Trivver also has a pending patent for systems and methods for facilitating a time varying cryptocurrency transfer over a decentralized network through smart contracts associated with cryptocurrency blockchain technology.  The XR Ad Exchange enables publishers to monetize their platforms in a way that is organic to the customer experience. Further, when a buyer and seller are matched, an C/S (Criteria/Specifications) match order is generated on the Trivver XRAE. Trivver is currently investing in establishing blockchain technology to manage these many transactions, matching advertiser criteria and publisher specifications, recording results, ensuring against ad fraud, auditing outcomes, initiating payments and delivering reports to all counter-parties.

Author: chickaboom
Title: [ANN][TOKEN][AR/VR] Trivver - Premier XR Advertising Network - Token Sale
Body: What Does The Trivver Platform Do?  1.Enables ADVERTISERS to create contextual, integrated XR ad campaigns. Trivver‚Äôs XR ads disseminate information such as offers, social media content and calls-toaction; and collect data about user engagement providing advertisers with unique insights into user interest and purchase intent.  2.Provides ADVERTISERS with significant leverage ‚Äì create one Branded Smart Object (BSO) and populate it to multiple XR environments and that BSO will dynamically adjust in shape, size, lighting and orientation to appear native within that environment.  3.Creates the opportunity for PUBLISHERS to efficiently monetize their XR content with advertising that is native and organic to the environment -- no more pop-ups or banners or interstitials -- ads that live within the context of their environments while providing the opportunity to increase the value of the content or property.  4.Provides PUBLISHERS with data about their users‚Äô levels of engagement that can direct editorial or other changes to content to enhance user experience and enable PUBLISHERS to more effectively index their content on the Trivver XR Advertising Platform (XRAE).  5.Aggregates an inventory of XR ads and environments on XRAE, including ADVERTISER criteria and PUBLISHER specifications and matches buyers and sellers fulfilling ad campaigns for ADVERTISERS and enables monetization of content for PUBLISHERS.  6.Rewards CONSUMERS for their time, attention and data through an innovative system of TOKEN incentives.  Check out Trivver's revolutionary technology here üëáüëáüëá  https://www.trivver.com/

Facebook paid $2bn to acquire Oculus in 2014. 2MM: The number of Google Cardboard head mounted displays distributed since the products June 2014 launch. 100: The number of VR games Oculus made available in 2016, with 20 games developed by Oculus Story Studios. 770B: The number of Virtual Boy VR gaming consoles Nintendo sold after its 1995 release, despite the platform‚Äôs technology limitations. 26: The number of Lowes home improvement stores featuring ‚ÄúHolorooms‚Äù to help customers visualize their remodeling projects. $215B: Projected revenues in the AR/VR category by 2021 ‚Äì 3 years from today. 121: The number of countries represented in the viewership data for the US Democratic presidential debate, which CNN streamed in VR. 48hrs: Time it took for Samsung‚Äôs $99 Gear VR to sell out on Amazon.com and BestBuy.com ‚Äî an indication of strong demand at lower prices. $995: The price of the consumer version of Oculus (launched in January 2016), with Oculus-ready PC bundles expected to sell for $1500. 200K: The number of developers Oculus has registered to create games on the VR platform (as of September 2015). $52B: The size of the US real estate / commissions market that VR stands to disrupt. Title: [ANN][TOKEN][AR/VR] Trivver - Premier XR Advertising Network - Token Sale
Body: Trivver‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäBlockchain-Based Extended Reality Ad Exchange  Trivver is a complicated blockchain platform aimed to provide the global XR advertising market for the commercialization and symbolization of extended reality technologies on smart devices. The platform will include publishers, agencies, brands and consumers of XR technologies. Trivver ad exchange offers branded content for target audiences in an extended reality environment, effectively integrating 3D models of Branded Smart Objects.  Developers of XR content and advertisers will be able to create, index and monetize the advertising content in a new format. As XR develops really rapidly, Trivver developers hope to take advantage of the opportunity and become a part of the growing market share. Their goal will be to develop advanced technologies for use in the XR advertising world and, therefore, in the marketing industry change.  Read more: https://medium.com/@Vladar49/trivver-blockchain-based-extended-reality-ad-exchange-9aa5411d7284
